## Welcome

This dashboard showcases my music playlist with data-driven insights from Spotify.

## About the Playlist

The dashboard features **Private School Vol. 1**, a curated collection of tracks. You can explore detailed information about each song including:

- Song titles and artists
- Track duration
- Popularity metrics
- Album information
- Genre classification
- Content ratings

The interactive player allows you to select and listen to any track directly from the dashboard.
